column3: Language name (in native language).  This means the NAME OF THE LANGUAGE BEING TRANSLATED INTO, and should NOT be a translation of the word 'English'
Default selection in language selection menu.
Notification button text - closes the notification.
Notification button text - don't show this notification again.
Notification button text - don't perform this action.
Notification button text - perfom this action.
Shown when awaiting user input when changing a key setting.
Warning message that a mod conflict was detected.

column2: Isto significa que o mod não é capaz de operar e foi desligado.
column3: Warning message letting the user know that the mod can't work.
Part of the mod conflict warning notification - header for the list of conflicting mods.

column2: O mod não foi capaz de aplicar corretamente os patches necessários do harmony.
column3: Warning message that a patching problem was detected, and the mod can't operate.

column2: As possíveis causas deste problema incluem:
column3: Header for list of possible causes of Harmony errors.

column2: O mod Harmony 2 não está instalado
column3: Possible cause of Harmony error - Harmony not installed.

column2: Um mod desatualizado e/ou quebrado está impedindo que o Harmony 2 funcione corretamente
column3: Possible cause of Harmony error - a broken mod (not this one) can cause things to stop working.

column2: Outro mod pode estar tentando aplicar um patch Harmony conflitante
column3: Possible cause of Harmony error - two mods trying to patch the same thing at once.
